text.autoconfig.npe.title: No Prying Eyes
text.autoconfig.npe.option.reports.@Tool: Server side, enable players reporting each other to Microsoft
text.autoconfig.npe.option.verbose.@Tool: Verbose logging, NPE is usually silent
text.autoconfig.npe.option.profanity_fil: Server side, enable the profanity filter
text.autoconfig.npe.option.respect_ms_ba: Respect Microsoft bans, if you are banned, you can only join servers with this setting disabled
text.autoconfig.npe.option.fake_ban.@Too: Make the game think you're banned, because why not
text.autoconfig.npe.option.message_signi: Should the game send/require signed messages? Note: disabling this setting can disable compatibility with some servers
